name: prodigal
description: Fast, reliable protein-coding gene prediction for prokaryotic genomes.

dependent_to.name: prokka
dependent_to.description:
Prokka is a software tool to annotate bacterial, archaeal and viral
genomes quickly and produce standards-compliant output files.

dependent_to.name: py-checkm-genome
dependent_to.description:
Assess the quality of microbial genomes recovered from isolates, single
cells, and metagenomes
